name: Hydrix
tag_list: electronics, software, systems--engineering, project--management, ip--productisation, applied--research, design--for--manufacture, wireless--mobility
overview:
Hydrix designs the ‘insides of things’ for our clients - that is the software and electronics that makes stuff actually work.

We mostly work for Biomedical, Mining, Consumer and Transport companies, but are happy to consider any project. As custom design enginers we can pretty much do design any system thrown our way but are are really, really good at wireless and monitoring/sensing, as well as desiging devices to easily meet any regulations (like FCC, FDA, EU etc).

We offer a full range of engineering services from initial concept definition and technical specification though to design & development, prototyping and into production and certification, as well as manage your manufacturers (we don’t manufacture stuff ourselves but we sure know how to make sure things are well manufactured).

We possess al the expected certfications - ISO9001, 14001 etc as well as experience designing for the tougher regulations like ISO13485 (biomedical) and IECEx explosive atmospheres) etc.

We really see ourselves as the Engineer’s Engineer - with our team having an average 18 years+ of product design experience, we focus on creating quality and compelling products for our clients and absolute client satisfaction satisfaction.
